reviewText: This is good happy with the dvd
My bird sunny loves it! It's very helpful dvd!

Good basic video covering a few points for your Cockateil not comprehensive enough to help a first time bird owner.
Outdated but OK!
The DVD is loose inside the container and I would not have chosen this one to buy. I would imagine it's scratched or somehow defective now and am disappointed in having defective things sent to me.
MY COCKATIEL REALLY ENJOYS IT WHEN I TURN THIS ON FOR HER.....SHE REALLY DOES REACT TO IT AND IS MORE TALKATIVE AFTER WATCHING IT!!!

I bought this dvd for my boys 7 & 11 yrs old. They both watched the entire dvd. They learned alot & liked it. The dvd is easy to understand & follow. The end section is a loop of a specific word you can choose to leave on for the bird.
this is a great video and it is good for my birds I play it for my birds and they seem to like it they are saying some words

Cockatiel DVD + Bonus Video Train Your Bird to Talk was a great preview to our owning a cockatiel.
It was simple to understand, yet thorough.  The bonus video was a little disappointing.  We expected more
 than a list of words a cockatiel could be trained to say.  The informative Cockatiel DVD has a place in our DVD Library.

This video teaches you how to do simple, basic taming and training your bird. It also teaches you how to provide a safe environment for your bird. I recommend it for the new or inexperienced bird owner. If your a breeder this DVD is too easy for you. But for just about anyone else who has a cockatiel or will have a cockatiel this is a great DVD to start with.
